lead_paragraph: The average rent for office space is $33 a square foot, compared with $56 in the garment district of Manhattan, or $73 for prime areas of Midtown.

headline.print_headline: Price and Proximity Draw Fashion to Long Island City
headline.main: Price and Proximity Draw Fashion Industry to Long Island City

snippet: The average rent for office space is $33 a square foot, compared with $56 in the garment district of Manhattan, or $73 for prime areas of Midtown.
abstract: Long Island City is drawing growing number of companies from clothing industry due to its close proximity to Midtown's garment district and because of its relatively affordable rent; trend has led developers to transform old warehouses to better suit needs of such companies.
